functions.name: energy
functions.description: Get the wall total energy contribution. The string argument is the energy name, 'energy-boundary' is the only energy type defined.

returns.description: Total energy contribution for the specified energy type

functions.name: find
functions.description: Get the Wall object with the given ID number or name.

returns.description: Wall object with the specified ID or name, or None if not found

functions.name: inbox
functions.signature: itasca.wall.inbox(lower_bound: vec, upper_bound: vec, boundary: bool = False) -> tuple of Wall
functions.description: Get walls with extents intersecting a box. If boundary is True, only return walls inside the extent.

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: Lower bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: Upper bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: If True, only return walls inside the extent

returns.description: Tuple of Wall objects within the specified box

functions.name: near
functions.description: Find the closest wall to a point.

returns.description: Closest Wall object to the specified point
